item.title: ECOM7121 Kiva Crowdfunding
item.description: Crowdfunding Crowdfunding platforms The key customers for the Kiva P2P micro-loan platform and the operation model Business model canvas for Kiva Summary crowdfunding platforms are two-sided platforms lenders make P2P loans to micro-entrepreneurs through the platform lenders are paid back over time local field partners select the micro-entrepreneurs to show case on the site and collect repayment for the loans Kiva has made more than $1B in mirco-loans, but has struggled to add mobile, social features TinBox, TenCent, Ant Forest and Do-Good Social Mobile Apps Kiva compares to newer do-good social mobile apps TinBox
